conversations.english: I couldn't look at you, and say you aren't beautiful!
conversations.chinese: 我不能看着你，硬说你不漂亮。
conversations.reply_english: You are pretending!
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在说谎！

title: 他本人很勤奋 He himself is very diligent

conversations.english: He has so many friends supporting him.
conversations.chinese: 他有这么多朋友支持他。
conversations.reply_english: And he himself is very diligent. Considering all these, I think he has the ball at his feet.
conversations.reply_chinese: 而且他本人也很勤奋，鉴于这些因素，我认为他有机会成功。

title: 你的戒指真好看 Your ring is very beautiful

conversations.english: Your ring is very beautiful.
conversations.chinese: 你的戒指非常好看。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you. It has been handed down in my family for three generations.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，他是我们家里三代传下来的。

title: 她总是很乐于助人 She is willing to help

conversations.english: My granny is such a kind-hearted person. She is willing to help.
conversations.chinese: 我奶奶心肠很好，总是乐于助人。
conversations.reply_english: She does have a heart of gold.
conversations.reply_chinese: 她确实有个好心肠。

title: 他很有远见卓识 He has a long head

conversations.english: He has a long head, I bet he will do well in his business.
conversations.chinese: 他很有远见卓识，我敢肯定他会将生意做得很红火。
conversations.reply_english: He does, he started five years ago and now ends up the richest among us.
conversations.reply_chinese: 的确。他五年前开始做生意，现在是我们当中的最富的一个。

title: 约翰的发明震惊了全国

conversations.english: Tom set the whole country by the ears with his discovery.
conversations.chinese: 约翰的发明震惊了全国。
conversations.reply_english: He is really terrific!
conversations.reply_chinese: 他真了不起！

title: 新官上任三把火A new broom sweeps clean

conversations.english: Our major is from a bigger city.
conversations.chinese: 我们的市长来自一个更大的城市。
conversations.reply_english: He’s doing fine. A new broom sweeps clean.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他做的很好，新官上任三把火。

title: 你的项目研究做得很好

conversations.english: Your search on this project has been excellent.
conversations.chinese: 你对这个项目的研究做得非常好。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you. I couldn’t have done it without the help of a strong team.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢。要是没有一个强大团队的支持，我做不到这些。

conversations.english: I am really impressed with your presentation skills.
conversations.chinese: 你做陈述的技巧给我留下了深刻的印象。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you. I have been working on it for several years.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢。我已经做了好几年这方面的工作了。

conversations.english: Hey, your Chinese is coming along!
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你的中文越来越好了！
conversations.reply_english: You think?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？

conversations.english: Mom, I just finished my paper. Can you proofread it before I hand it in？
conversations.chinese: 妈，我刚完成我的报告。你可以在我交给老师钱帮我校对吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, let’s take a look. Sweetie, this is terrific. Your ideas are so original.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，我们一起看看吧。甜心，写得很好。你的想法很有原创性。

conversations.english: Are you ready to go the concert?
conversations.chinese: 你准备去听音乐会吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Shoud we go there by bus so we aren't late?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的.我们一起去坐公共汽车吧?这样不会迟到.

conversations.english: What a nice uniform!
conversations.chinese: 多漂亮的制服啊!
conversations.reply_english: Thanks,do you like it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢,你喜欢吗?

conversations.english: It's getting cold.
conversations.chinese: 天越来越冷了!
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I bought a scarf yesterday. It's really nice and warm. Have a look.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊.我昨天买了条新围巾,又好看又暖和.你来看看.

conversations.english: This place is great. I'm surprised they have so much.
conversations.chinese: 这地方好棒哦！我很惊讶这里有这么多的东西。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but it takes a while to find things.It's not organized as carefully as a regular store.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，但找东西需要一点时间就是了。这里不像一般的店那样井然有序。

conversations.english: OK, Mr. Wu. You may come in. I'm Anne Smith and on my right, my colleague, Anna Duncan, and on my left, Angela Lamb. Do please sit down.
conversations.chinese: 好了，吴先生，你可以进来了。我是安妮·史密斯，我右面是我的同事安娜·邓肯，左边是安吉拉·兰姆。请坐吧。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you. Good afternoon Mrs. Smith, Miss Duncan, Miss Lamb.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你。下午好，史密斯女士、邓肯小姐、兰姆小姐。

conversations.english: The concert was really great.
conversations.chinese: 演唱会真的是太棒了!
conversations.reply_english: I agree.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我同意。

conversations.english: Hey! That food was terrific. I can't eat another bite. Are you sure you don't want another dish?
conversations.chinese: 嘿！食物很美味。我一口也吃不下去了。你确定你不要再来一道菜？
conversations.reply_english: No, I'm full. My stomach isn't growling at me any more.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我饱了。我的肚子已经不咕咕叫了。

conversations.english: Good morning. Phyllis Seymour speaking.
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我是菲莉丝·希莫。
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Ms. Seymour? It’s Allan Parker. I’ve been waiting to call you and thank you for all your help last week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，希莫女士？我是阿兰·帕克。我一直想打电话给你感谢你上星期的帮助。

title: 听说你获奖我真是高兴

conversations.english: Philip, I was really glad to hear about your award. Congratulations!
conversations.chinese: 菲利普，听说你获奖我真是高兴。祝贺你！
conversations.reply_english: Thanks, Denise. Actually, I was really surprised. I mean, there were a lot of qualified people out there.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢。荻妮丝。事实上这很使我意外。我是说，够条件的人很多。

conversations.english: You must like negotiating a lot. People are saying, you are a super negotiator.
conversations.chinese: 你一定很喜欢谈判。大家都说，你是一个超棒的谈判家。
conversations.reply_english: Ha, I am flattered. Actually, when it comes to negotiate, you don’t need to like it. You just need to understand how it works.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哈哈，过奖了。事实上，每当要谈判的时候，你都不需要喜欢它。你只需要明白如何进行就行了。

conversations.english: She is really pretty, isn't she? Her skin looks so baby-smooth!
conversations.chinese: 她真的很漂亮，是吗？她的皮肤看起来像宝宝的一样光滑！
conversations.reply_english: Well, it's just that she put a lot of makeup on her face. Actually, natural beauty comes from within.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，她只是在脸上涂了很多化妆品而已。实际上，自然美是发自内心的。

conversations.english: Did you punch in?
conversations.chinese: 你上班时有打卡吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. By the way, you are having a great make-up today. I like the color of your lipstick. So adorable!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。顺便说一下，今天你的妆化得不错。我喜欢你的唇膏的颜色。如此讨人喜欢！

conversations.english: The band is pretty good. How do you like the music?
conversations.chinese: 乐队不错啊。你喜欢这支曲子吗？
conversations.reply_english: It's very nice. I haven't heard live music in a while. This is fun.
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺喜欢的。我很久没在现场听过音乐了，感觉很不错。

title: 你的圣诞礼物包好了吗

conversations.english: Your tree looks beautiful. Do you decorate it this way every year?
conversations.chinese: 你们的树看起来好漂亮。你们每年都这么布置吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it’s a family tradition dating back to my childhood. We use the same lights and ornaments, but of course we have a new tree each year. The children made some of these decorations. Here, you can hang this on one of those high branches.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。记得从我孩提时候开始这就是家里的传统了。我们用一样的灯泡和装饰品；当然，我们每年都用一棵新树。这些装饰中有一部分是孩子们弄的。给，你可以把这个吊在一根高枝上。

conversations.english: Lester, you are really fantastic at automobile repair.
conversations.chinese: 莱斯特，你修理汽车可真行。
conversations.reply_english: Thanks, June. But I think I need to be certified as a mechanic before I’m allowed to repair cars for a living.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，琼。但是我想我需要考核一个机械工的执照，我才可以被允许以修车为业。

conversations.english: Wow! That’s a pretty dress,but it’s too expensive.
conversations.chinese: 哇！这衣服真漂亮，但太贵了
conversations.reply_english: Yeah,it is!Why is it so expensive?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，为什么这么贵？

title: 你的演讲印象令人深刻

conversations.english: Hi, Monica, congratulations! Your presentation at the meeting was very successful and everyone was impressed by your speech. And it was so persuasive and I bet our clients will be convinced to invest their money in this project. You really made a big contribution to our company.
conversations.chinese: Monica，你好，恭喜你！你在会议上的报告和成功，每个人都对你的演讲印象深刻。它是如此有说服力，我确信我们的客户肯定会把钱投资在这个项目上的。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you, I just tried my best. I am very happy to know you like it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你，我只是尽我最大的努力。知道你喜欢它我很高兴。

conversations.english: Every teacher likes him.
conversations.chinese: 每个老师都喜欢他。
conversations.reply_english: They say he can sum up like winking.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他们说他反应很快。

conversations.english: The Great Wall is a great attraction for visitors.
conversations.chinese: 长城对游客来说很有吸引力。
conversations.reply_english: It's a man-made wonder.I've seen it many times in textbooks and it's part of my dream to visit it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 它是人工的奇迹。在课本里见过多少次了,参观长城是我的梦想。

conversations.english: How delicious!Tender and crisp!
conversations.chinese: 太好吃了！又嫩又脆。
conversations.reply_english: This is the specialty of our restaurant,sir.
conversations.reply_chinese: 先生，这是本店的拿手菜。

title: 我从没喝过这么好喝的汤

conversations.english: This is the best dinner I've ever had.
conversations.chinese: 这是我吃过的最好的饭了。
conversations.reply_english: How about the soup?
conversations.reply_chinese: 汤怎么样？

conversations.english: Mrs.Smith,time has stood still with you!
conversations.chinese: 史密斯太太，青春在你身上驻足了！
conversations.reply_english: Thank you.You're partial.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，这是你的偏爱。

conversations.english: He got the scholarship to Harvard.
conversations.chinese: 他得到了哈佛大学的奖学金。
conversations.reply_english: You're kidding!
conversations.reply_chinese: 你开玩笑！

title: 这幅中国春联书法真美

conversations.english: Whew! I had to wait for almost an hour to get to the front of the line.
conversations.chinese: 呼！我排了快一个小时才到队伍前面。
conversations.reply_english: You have much patience.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你很有耐心.

conversations.english: What a pin-up she is!
conversations.chinese: 她真是个美人儿！
conversations.reply_english: Can you imagine she's over forty?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你能想象到她已经四十多岁了吗？

conversations.english: She's pretty and meek.
conversations.chinese: 她又漂亮又温顺.
conversations.reply_english: No, I can't agree with you. She's one but not the other.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不,我不同意你的看法.前者正确,后者可不对.

conversations.english: Boy!What a beauty!I fall in love with her at the first sight.
conversations.chinese: 哎哟，真美！我真是与她一见钟情。
conversations.reply_english: The beauty under the tree?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是说树下那个美人儿吗？

title: 你的宽条面味道很独特

conversations.english: Nicole, your Fettucini is very...unique.
conversations.chinese: 妮可，你的宽条面很……独特。
conversations.reply_english: But not as good as your mother's, right?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不过还是没有你妈妈做的好吃，对吧？

conversations.english: Wow, the view from the peak is so grand!
conversations.chinese: 哇，从山顶往下看，景色真壮观！
conversations.reply_english: Look, most of the maple leaves have turned red.
conversations.reply_chinese: 看，大部分枫叶都变红了。

conversations.english: Who did the stupid thing?
conversations.chinese: 谁干的蠢事？
conversations.reply_english: Maybe it was Dick.
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许是迪克。

conversations.english: Do you have to leave soon?
conversations.chinese: 你很快就要走吗？
conversations.reply_english: No. Actually I can stay longer. Dave called to say that there is a beautiful Chinese girl who’s going to pick me up at the school gate tonight at ten thirty instead of eight thirty.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不。实际上我还可以呆久一点。戴夫打电话来说今晚有个漂亮的女孩会在学校门口接我，八点半改成了十点半。

title: 那小子是个天才程序员

conversations.english: How are Zina's new programmers working out?
conversations.chinese: 吉娜找来新的程序设计师行吗？
conversations.reply_english: I hate to admit it, but they're good. And fast. The Filipino kid is a genius.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不愿意承认，不过他们很行。而且手脚又快。那菲律宾小子是个天才。

conversations.english: Are you Elvin?
conversations.chinese: 你是艾文吗？
conversations.reply_english: Elvin Dixon. Who are you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 艾文迪克森。你是谁？
